Translations.Text: Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, ad asen Nekkes tucmitin nnsen, a ten Nkafi $ef wayen xeddmen ifuqen
Nweuua amdan ar lewqama, s imawlan is. Ma lezmen fellak, ad iyI tcarkev ayen ur tessinev, ur asen ppa$ awal. Tu$alin nnwen, $uoI. Ad awen Mle$ acu txeddmem
Wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, a ten Nessekcem ar iaaoviyen

Ger imdanen, wid iqqaoen: "numen s Oebbi". Ma meenen, deg ubrid n Oebbi, ad eesben ahewwel n medden, d aaaqeb n Oebbi. Mi d iusa l$elb, s$uo Mass ik, ar ad inin: "ih, nella yidwen". Day ur Ieoa ara Oebbi, i illan deg idmaren imavalen
War ccekk, Oebbi Issen wid iumnen, Issen ixabiten
Nnan wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "ddut d ubrid nne$, a nbibb tuccva nnwen". Nitni ur pbibbin acemma, si tuccva nnsen. S tidep, nitni d ikeddaben
War ccekk, ad bibben tiaekkwmin nnsen, akked tiaekkwmin nniven. Ih, ad ppusteqsin, ass n tnekra, af wayen id snulfuyen
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue, i ugdud is. Izde$ yides, agim kkes ed smuset iseggwasen. Ibbwi ten ueemmal, nitni d imednas
